"Wasn't there a Yahoo group dedicated to Sengoku Jidai wargames?"
 
The A=
sianWar Yahoo group has a heavy focus on Sengoku gaming, along with other J=
apanese eras. It also covers Chinese, Korean, etc, warfare. It's an excelle=
nt resource and replaced the Gekokujo group after it was taken over by spam=
mers.
